sentence.value: Eberhard Köllner (born 29 September 1939 in Stassfurt, Germany) was selected for Soyuz 31 as the backup for Sigmund Jähn.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Eberhard Köllner|Eberhard_K%C3%B6llner]] (born 29 [[September 1939|Invasion_of_Poland]] in [[Stassfurt , Germany|Sta%C3%9Ffurt]] was selected for [[Soyuz 31|Soyuz_31]] as [[the backup|Backup]] for [[Sigmund Jähn|Sigmund_J%C3%A4hn]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Eberhard Köllner|Eberhard_K%C3%B6llner]] (born 29 September 1939 in Stassfurt, Germany) was selected for [[Soyuz 31|Soyuz_31]] as the backup for [[Sigmund Jähn|Sigmund_J%C3%A4hn]].

sentence.value: He later became the Director of the Airforce Academy of the German Democratic Republic in the rank of an Oberst ("Colonel"), following the reunion of Germany he refused to be transferred to the (West) German Bundeswehr.
